name: Slam Sentral
description:
ARE YOU READY TO SLAM?
Get ready to SLAM in TeamPotooFox's debut competitive brawler game SLAM SENTRAL!

[Requires the use of console controllers, preferably with rumble,  to be played]

  •  Experience high fidelity pixel art in action.
  • Recommended 2-4 for players.
  • Take control of one of four elemental guardians and SLAM your opponents into the wall oblivion.
  • Engage in exciting fisticuffs with your in stages of varying lethality, with each one having their own sets of features to watch out for.

CONTROLS:

  • Hold to charge and release the Right Bumper (RB) of the controller to SLAM
  • D-Pad to move
